about_the_game:
Dive deeper into the enigmatic world of "Mystical Riddles" with the latest downloadable content, "Ship From Beyond DLC." Packed with new mini-games, challenging puzzles and hidden objects, this expansion promises an even more captivating experience. Explore four new intriguing locations, each with its unique secrets and narrative.

Discover new details about the characters and unravel the story's secrets, complete all quests to unlock exclusive achievements. Start your journey and achieve new heights in mystery-solving!

🧩 VISIT THE CAPTAIN'S CABIN!
Step into the captain's personal quarters brimming with mystery. Search through a desk scattered with secretive papers, inspect ornate wall decorations, and sift through shelves of ancient books. Every corner of this cabin holds clues vital to your quest!

🧩 SEARCH THE SIREN'S TREASURY!
Uncover the hidden depths of the siren's treasure trove. This underwater realm is filled with artifacts and enigmatic items, each holding the key to untold stories!

🧩 EXPLORE THE MUSEUM AT THE FAIR!
Navigate through the bustling museum set in the vibrant fairgrounds. Examine statues and paintings among a plethora of exhibits, where crucial evidence is cleverly concealed. Stay alert to uncover the truth that will illuminate your path forward!

🧩 COME TO THE PERFORMER'S STASH!
Delve into the performer's secluded stash, a place cluttered with dusty scrolls and ancient books. Decode the secrets hidden within these artifacts to piece together the narrative and solve the overarching mystery!

Embark on this enhanced adventure where every hidden object and solved puzzle brings you closer to solving the mysteries aboard the "Ship From Beyond."
